content: the emma square is a simple square designed for the june 2017 devon sun yarns retreat and named after my brave friend emma it is the first in a series of squares dedicated to my crochet friends the square is simple to memorise once you have made a few and it would be perfect for a scrapghan requiring small amounts of different colours for the retreat we actually made the squares in undyed yarn and then dyed them afterwards which is something to think about if you want to try something new the pattern is supplied as a written-only pattern as well as a photo tutorial not that it needs it you can also find a few ideas for how to use this square on my website i hope you enjoy this pattern dedri
